channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: No need to sell this AI data center play ahead of earnings — and updates on 3 more industrial stocks
item.description: Deutsche Bank listed Dover as a short-term sell idea, cautioning investors of underwhelming quarterly results later that may pressure shares later thi...

item.title: Honeywell Plans to Spin Off Advanced Materials Business
item.description: The move is part of the chief executive’s plan to simplify the business around three core segments.

item.title: Nike withdraws guidance, postpones investor day as it gears up for CEO change
item.description: Nike on Tuesday said it was withdrawing its full-year guidance and postponing its investor day as it gears up for a new CEO to take the helm.

item.title: Samsung posts disappointing third-quarter profit guidance as it grapples with AI chips
item.description: Samsung posts worse-than-expected guidance for third quarter

item.title: Euro Risks Falling as Markets Stick to October Rate-Cut Bets
item.description: The euro risks weakening as money markets are nearly fully pricing in an interest-rate cut in October, even as the decision could be a closer call tha...

item.title: Levi Strauss trims guidance as it weighs sale of Dockers business
item.description: Denim maker Levi Strauss is looking to sell its Dockers brand as the khaki maker drags down the company's overall performance.

item.title: Modelo brewer Constellation falls despite an earnings beat. Here's why we're not concerned
item.description: Constellation Brands on Thursday delivered a solid earnings report and set the stage for an anchor to be raised in the next two quarters.

item.title: Base Metal Prices Drop as China Economy Briefing Disappoints Market
item.description: Industrial metals declined as disappointment from an anticipated briefing by China’s top economic planner earlier in the session mostly failed to offe...

item.title: European Stock Indexes Fall After Chinese Stimulus Hopes Fade
item.description: European stock indexes were down in early trade, tracking falls across most of Asia as investors tempered their expectations on China’s economic-stimu...

item.title: China's Ghost Cities Are a Problem for Europe's Luxury Brands, Too
item.description: Luxury spending in China traditionally is correlated with home prices. That is bad news for global brands that start reporting the latest quarterly re...
